channel.title: 99 in 3 weeks?
channel.description:
I'm looking to get at least 1 99 in 3 weeks on RS. What would be the fastest?
ATM: Currently botting 1-2k coal a day so i can hit 77 minning fast.
My stats atm: [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/xc0zls.png[/img] None of the "low stats" replies, I've had this account since 01 or 02, and I am usually not concerned about training any stats, I was typically the noob that hung around to talk.

item.title: 99 in 3 weeks?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:79, topic:354901”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=451468.msg3319039#msg3319039 date=1282545200]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=451468.msg3319037#msg3319037 date=1282545034]
ehhhh to much rs talk drives me nuts :@
[/quote]Then don’t visit the RuneScape discussion section
[/quote]I don’t mind reading some stuff. But seriously, read up… it’s overboard. + the thread is a question, not a discussion for what you’re botting, skilling, etc…[/quote]
Generally it started out as suggestions/discussion, now its more or less progress/discussion. You don’t need to read it if you don’t want to.

Read full topic

Anyways, I’m off. Laters.

item.title: 99 in 3 weeks?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:75, topic:354901”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=451468.msg3319028#msg3319028 date=1282543841]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=451468.msg3319006#msg3319006 date=1282541191]

[quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=451468.msg3318986#msg3318986 date=1282540158]

Already gained 3 levels, current 70 cooking, 12k lobbies until 81 cooking (when I start swordies) Should be done within 13/14 hours

It will really slow down after 85, so expect 2-3 levels a day at most at then. (im currently gaining 2 a day, as its taking me 300k+ per level)

Averaging 950 fish per hour: (once I get 81)

81-90 (Swordfish) = 22,520 cooks ~ 24 Hours
90-94 (Monkfish) = 17,322 cooks ~ 18 hours
94-99 (Sharks) = 24,238 cooks ~ 26 hours
If I’m botting almost 24/7, I can finish before thursday

Thats how people get caught and banned normally. I only bot 10 hours a day. Mainly because all of the bots i get, have a minor bug that will cause it to pause.
[/quote]I was WC botting for almost 20 hrs a day until level 90. I think Jagex likes me because my account is so old

My bot was frozen while I was gone for 2.5 hrs, but I’m still already level 73.

My main, before i got it unbanned, hadn’t been logged onto for like 1453 days. (or something very close to that -.-). Doesn’t mean they like it cause of its age.
[/quote]My point was I got away with a lot of botting.

Obviously

BTW - Know of a great way to money-farm, that can get at least 500k in 10 hours? (I know mining, so don’t mention that :P)
[/quote]Woodcutting[/quote]
Your talking about after 75 right? Atm I’m 60WC…

Read full topic

90-94 (Monkfish) = 17,322 cooks ~ 18 hours
94-99 (Sharks) = 24,238 cooks ~ 26 hours
If I’m botting almost 24/7, I can finish before thursday

Thats how people get caught and banned normally. I only bot 10 hours a day. Mainly because all of the bots i get, have a minor bug that will cause it to pause.

My bot was frozen while I was gone for 2.5 hrs, but I’m still already level 73.

My main, before i got it unbanned, hadn’t been logged onto for like 1453 days. (or something very close to that -.-). Doesn’t mean they like it cause of its age.

Obviously

BTW - Know of a great way to money-farm, that can get at least 500k in 10 hours? (I know mining, so don’t mention that :P)[/quote]Woodcutting

item.title: 99 in 3 weeks?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“0zilo0, post:69, topic:354901”]you could easly bot 99 wc by willows and 99 fletching if you wish to bot 10 hours a day ish or
if you want to be more focused on money buy maple logs and fletch maple longs and sell to general store
you make about 40k a hour and it’s decent exp concerding your botting :)[/quote]
I can make faster cash mining at my lvl, nty

Read full topic

item.title: 99 in 3 weeks?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:63, topic:354901"][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=451468.msg3318750#msg3318750 date=1282521505]
87 cooking, and down to like 2.5M cash. Not going to last much longer before I’ll need to money-farm.
[/quote]

Wow, i didn’t think trout was that fast. I’ll do 99 cooking after 99 wc, 90 wc at the moment, I’m botting maples and i was botting ivy, but i need to have some logs for later, :p. I’ll probably bot to around 92 so then I’m halfway, then buy my way to 99 cooking, firemaking, and fletching. Then finish up fishing, 77 ;([/quote]
Lol, I gave up on trout and decided to go onto Lobster at around 78 cooking.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 in 3 weeks?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:54, topic:354901”][quote author=shrogg link=topic=451468.msg3316861#msg3316861 date=1282376869]
Let me edit that for you…

I GREATLY suggest:

Trout Tuna - until lvl 74 70

Lobster - Until lvl 82

Swordfish - Until lvl 92 89

Monks - Until 99 94

Shark - Until 99

That is the pattern i followed, as it follows the rate at which you will stop burning using cooking gauntlets

[/quote]
If you have a pair it is great, I never found them useful so I cba to get them myself.[/quote]

How goes the progress on the cooking?

Read full topic

item.title: 99 in 3 weeks?
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

yeah, do that, and make sure you are wearing gauntlets xD because i had a little failure of around 100 shark.
but yeah, i actually recommend starting shark at 92-93 as you will level it up alot faster than monks, and when wearing gaunts, the burn rate is around 1 every 25 to 35 so you dont loose anything much.

Read full topic

item.title: 99 in 3 weeks?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:58, topic:354901”]yeah, i have 99 cook and i followed that and i got 99 real quick :D[/quote]Like how quick?

Fish No burn level without gauntlets No burn levelwith gauntlets
Tuna 63 63
Lobster 74 68
Swordfish 86 81
Monkfish 92 90
Shark N/A 94
Cavefish N/A 94
Rocktail N/A 95

I think I should do: (I’m currently at 67)

Tuna to 68
and then just continue that list

Read full topic

item.title: 99 in 3 weeks?
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

yeah, i have 99 cook and i followed that and i got 99 real quick
